WorkItem.Description:
After a successful import of a custom package file the corresponding 'vendor' entry under the updates tree disappeared and the update is not displayed.  When i try to import this package again the message "There's already an update with this Package ID. No import will be perform." is displayed.
Is there a way to cleanup this invisible package and restore the vendor group?

Comments.Message:
Hi,
can you check if "Show locally published updates..." is enabled in "Settings"

Regards
Norbert
This setting is unchecked. The updates should not show up in the wsus console.
Please, go to : Tools -> Settings -> Updates Tab and tick the option «Show locally-published upsates…»
After changing this setting the vendor group is now back,  that|s nice because I now can see that imported update that i had declined directly in the database. Thanks for your help.
